{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking for the number of patients who have blood pressures between the 3rd and 4th quartile. In a data set, each quartile represents 25% of the data. Therefore, the data between the 3rd and 4th quartile represents the top 25% of the data. Since there are 200 patients in total, 25% of 200 is 50.", "answer_choice": "B"}
